lead_paragraph: Djokovic defeated Kei Nishikori 6-3, 6-2, 6-4, and Federer beat Tomas Berdych, 7-6 (4), 6-2, 6-4, to set up the 45th meeting between the tennis stars.
snippet: Djokovic defeated Kei Nishikori 6-3, 6-2, 6-4, and Federer beat Tomas Berdych, 7-6 (4), 6-2, 6-4, to set up the 45th meeting between the tennis stars.

headline.main: Novak Djokovic and Roger Federer to Meet in Australian Open Semifinals
